item.description:
Looking for a great deal? How about a 4 course seafood feast for $15.00!

 

Red Lobster is doing their first ever 4 course dinner for a fantastic price and we are going to take advantage. Start off with soup...then on to a salad and their very special melt-in-your mouth Cheddar Bay Biscuits. Next choose one of 7 entrees...then top it off with a great dessert! Check out the menu...

http://www.redlobster.com/menus/specials/?cmpid=slmsnppc&kwmsn=the-red-lobster&mkwid=pPW6XIDmx&pcrid=267662550

 

Get ready for a treat...and a bargain. Come join us...see you onoard!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or Chuck....cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: We're Goin' Fishin' ... at Red Lobster!!!
